sentences.english: Part three, the problems in the Lahu nationality" s curriculum resource developing."

sentences.english: Praise God that over 10% of the Lahu have come to Christ.

sentences.english: Lusheng dance is performed on Lahu traditional festivals such as Gourd Festival.
